readme: # Atom Dark Minimal Syntax It can be used in combination with [atom-dark-minimal-ui](https://atom.io/themes/atom-dark-minimal-ui). *Python* ![Python screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/mYpXoXZ.png) *JavaScript* ![JavaScript screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/lpHQHCp.png) *HTML* ![HTML screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/FzHpYwP.png) *LESS* ![LESS screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/R4JiCa1.png) ### Installation ** Open a terminal and type** ```shell apm install atom-dark-minimal-syntax ``` or ** Via Atom** 1. Open *File > Settings > Install* 2. Type `atom-dark-minimal-syntax` and set the filter to *Themes* 3. Find and install theme **Activate theme** 1. Open *File > Settings > Themes* 2. Select `Atom Dark Minimal` from the *Syntax Theme* drop-down menu Happy Coding!
